properties.Description: Meg assisted at a child's health conference held by the Woman's Club of Emmitsburg at the Slagle Hotel. This was the first clinic held in Emmitsburg.
Meg visited St. Anthony.

Meg was in charge of a clinic in Wolfsville, in collaboration with the Woman's Club. She gave directions and consultations to mothers. "Miss Newman, in assisting mothers with the care of their children, pointed out the importance of taking preventive measures in regard to all physical ailments, offered specific advice in each case, distributed feeding lists and other material, and aided generally in the promotion of better health among persons of that locality."
properties.Article_Name: 35 Persons Examined at Clinic at Wolfsville

properties.Description: Meg gave a health talk in Thurmont with Dr. Kefauver.
Meg assisted at a health clinic at Myersville. She spoke at PTA meetings about the benefits of health clinics.
properties.Article_Name: Health Clinic Conducted at Myersville Monday

properties.Description: Meg held a child hygiene clinic in Franklinville.
Meg assisted at a clinic at the B&O Emergency Hospital. "Eight patients were present. The rush before Christmas and the inclement weather prevented some from attending who had been recommended."
Meg inspected Brunswick schools for diseases.
Meg assisted at a bimonthly tuberculosis clinic in Frederick.
properties.Article_Name: 17 Patients at Regular Clinic at Courthouse

properties.Description: Meg, Katherine Scully, and Pauline Michael speak at the Parent-Teachers Association of Woodsboro in the Woodsboro Opera House.
properties.Article_Name: Epidemic Colds Sweeps County; Public Warned

properties.Activity: Meeting of Federated Charities and Public Health Department
properties.Description: Meg attended a meeting of the Federated Charities and Public Health Department of Frederick.

properties.Activity: Talk at the Evangelical Reformed Church Altar Guild meeting
properties.Description: Meg spoke at the Evangelical Reformed Church Altar Guild meeting, describing the work of a public health nurse. "Stressing the work in the schools of Frederick as an important phase of public health work, Miss Newman described the aims of the local health department in regard to clinics being held here, told of plans to hold a dental clinic, and gave a comprehensive general outline of the work in this section of the state."

properties.Activity: School Inspections at the Jefferson School
properties.Description: Meg inspected the Academy building and Jefferson school.
Meg assists at a children's clinic in Jefferson, at the St. Paul's Lutheran church Sunday school rooms.
properties.Article_Name: Children's Clinic: Twenty-three Youngsters Examined at Jefferson

properties.Description: Meg assisted at a chest clinic at the Brunswick Emergency Hospital, the largest ever held in the country.

properties.Activity: Monocacy Club Annual Outing at Saubel's Inn
properties.Description: Meg attended the Monocacy Club Annual Outing.
properties.Article_Name: 125 Members And Guests On Annual Outing Given By Monocacy Club May 19

properties.Description: Meg assists at a pre-school conference at the Woodsboro school.
properties.Article_Name: Examine Children for New School Year

properties.Activity: Child's Health Conference for Woman's Club of Emmitsburg
properties.Description: Meg assisted at a child's health conference for the Woman's Club of Emmitsburg. Her friend Beulah Weldon, who was visiting the area, also assisted.

properties.Activity: Child Clinic at the Washington Street School
properties.Description: Meg assisted at a child clinic at the Washington Street School in Frederick. "Twenty-four children from a list of 30 who will enter the school in the Fall were examined, and satisfactory results obtained. It was stated that a large number had been vaccinated during the past two weeks, in accordance with the direction of the health officer."
Meg assists at a health clinic in Middletown High School.

properties.Activity: Health Address at the PTA of the Adamstown School
properties.Description: Meg gave a health address at a special meeting of the PTA of Adamstown school.

properties.Activity: Maryland Social Service Club Meeting and Luncheon
properties.Description: Meg attended the meeting and luncheon of the Frederick branch of the Maryland Social Service Club.
properties.Article_Name: Service Club to Dine Here Today

properties.Description: Meg assisted at a Frederick chest clinic at the Courthouse.
Meg attended an informal conference, at which they determined that the state regional health conference would need to be postponed because of weather.
properties.Article_Name: Conference of Health Board Here Postponed
